question.q: Do you use a high efficiency showerhead?
question.rec: Try to take the shorter showers for saving water. Don’t leave the water running unnecessarily; it can use up to 5 gallon per minute!

question.q: On a scale of 1-10, with 10 being the most often, how often do you wash dishes using a washing machine as opposed to by hand?
question.rec: According to a study at the University of Bonn in Germany, dishwashers use half of energy, one-six of the water, and less soap than handwashing. Try to use the machine for big/medium loads!

question.q: When using a washing machine, do you use a top-loader (yes) or front-loader(no) ?
question.rec: Keep an eye out for front-loading machines; they use 40-75% less water than top-loaders!
